name: Criminal Frequency
description:
Help your teammates to escape with money.
You have to listen to radio conversations and lead your crew around the streets.

This game was made for the 2019 LÖVE Jam by:
sawa9889 (itch.io page) - code
saviorium (itch.io page) - code & graphics

Thanks for Jeinara and V_Mike for playtesting and ideas

Controlls:

Use your scrollwheel to control radio frequency
Click on the walkie-talkie to answer your teammates

Libraries used:

LÖVE 11.3
hump - for classes, gamestates, vectors
peachy - for animations

Assets used:

Sounds from https://freesound.org
Fonts from https://www.fontspace.com
Please refer to Readme.md for links
